_sText:
Gg_stalker_arena 1.1
------------------------

This is a map remake of the arena found in S.T.A.L.K.E.R: Shadow of Chernobyl. 
It's actually a small arena in game but the size of my map turned out bigger. :S
I remade it as best I could, looking at the most simple of details to remake it in it's shining image but with limited textures and props, it isn't exact. (I had to add some extra cover for the sake of balance.)

The map features:
-Buyzones 
-HDR 
-60 spawn points

Have fun stalker.

UPDATE
------------------------
- Removed 6 lights and rearranged the other 6 (See last screen shot.)
- Aligned some textures (They wont stay in position when I move brushes around.)

The bsp has the same name because when I saved it as gg_stalker_arena_1.1 it couldn't generate a new .BSP it just said "Could not find specified path" for something like that when compiling.
